title: Mister Pip sea horse and parrot fish

content.question: In the sixteenth paragraph (“I miss . . . one”), the specific details in her observations about sea horses and parrot fish suggest which of the following about the motives of Matilda’s mother?

choices.label: She seeks to shift attention back to the river.
She wants to end an awkward silence.
She intends to defuse Matilda’s anger.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
